Docs.summary: The System.IdentityModel.Configuration namespace contains classes that provide configuration for applications and services built using the Windows Identity Foundation (WIF). The classes in this namespace represent settings under the [\<identityConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CidentityConfiguration%3E.md) element. Classes that configure federation using the WS-Federation protocol are contained primarily in the namespace. These settings appear under the [\<system.identityModel.services\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.identityModel.services%3E.md) element in a configuration file.
